Hero Ship 0
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00  12
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00  11
11 00 10 11 10 00 11 00  10
11 01 11 11 11 01 11 00  09
11 11 10 11 10 11 11 00  08
01 11 10 10 10 11 01 00  07
10 01 11 10 11 01 10 00  06
10 00 11 11 11 00 10 00  05
00 00 10 11 10 00 00 00  04
00 00 00 11 00 00 00 00  03
00 00 00 11 00 00 00 00  02
00 00 00 01 00 00 00 00  01
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00  00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 -01
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 -02
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 -03


00 - Invisible
01 - Grey
10 - Red
11 - White
